document.full_text: a report by cbssports.com indicated that the knicks were considering a two-year extension for walsh and that it would be up to walsh to decide whether to stay.
document.title: walsh's status may be resolved soon with a contract offer
lines_and_colors: a report by cbssports.com indicated that the knicks were considering a two-year extension for walsh and that it would be up to walsh to decide whether to stay.
